narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Kira Hawkins is a Speech-Language Pathologist,   provider based in Chandler, AZ. From 2022-09 through 2024-10, this provider received $116K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 338 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 1.5× the national median for 92507 (92507), at $75 per claim vs. the median of $49, placing them above the 75th percentile.
100% of billing is concentrated in 92507 (92507), indicating significant specialization in this service.
